title: Same Day On Loop, Itâ€™s Been Thousands Of Years - Novel Updates
author: Mekka Pakka
description:
The same day on loop for over ten thousand times. 

Ye Yang had been reckless, indulged himself in pleasure, and also learned many things. Piano, martial arts, boxing, car racing... 

Each skill was perfected. 

In this endless cycle, he had also investigated many people, finding out their weaknesses and secrets! 

When this loop finally ended, Ye Yang decided that he would climb to the pinnacle of this world.>
